name: Flipkiss
description:
Flipkiss is a small, cute and new kind of matching game!

Story: Help Loe to get back to his better half Mi. Silly Loe forgot their 101st anniversary while playing a video game. To teach Loe a lesson about love, Yonono, Loe and Mi's magical friend sent Loe to the planet of the Flips. Now he's flying back to Mi with the help of the Flips.

Gameplay: Make two Flips kiss & match with the swipe of your finger. The faster you kiss the longer your game lasts. The more kisses you kiss the more presents you can collect for Mi. Help Loe to reunite with Mi by collecting all 40 presents for her.

- - - - - - - - - - -

Flipkiss is a game about caring for each other. Therefore we want to raise awareness and funds for research for people affected by lupus, an incurable autoimmune disease.

- - - - - - - - - - -
